thread.title: Seriously, What Did Warren Beatty's Best Picture Card Say?
thread.title_full: Seriously, What Did Warren Beatty's Best Picture Card Say?

title: Seriously, What Did Warren Beatty's Best Picture Card Say?
text:
Seriously, What Did Warren Beatty's Best Picture Card Say? 
The Internet has some theories about what really went down. By Estelle Tang Feb 27, 2017 Tonight, in one of the most shocking Oscars moments ever, the wrong Best Picture winner was announced. Presenter Warren Beatty was accidentally handed the Best Actress card instead of the Best Picture card, and as a result Faye Dunaway read out the title of La La Land instead of the rightful winner, Moonlight . Warren Beatty seems to be opening an envelope that says 'Actress in a Leading Role'. He must have been handed the wrong one somehow. Yikes. pic.twitter.com/Rma4wp80aX 
â€” Neil Patrick Harris (@ActuallyNPH) February 27, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below But what was really on that card that Beatty and Dunaway were holding? Was it printed with the winner's title? Or something else completely? Twitter has theories:
